name: Cryptid Conjecture
description:
Title: Cryptid Conjecture

Platform: PC web game

Genre: Puzzle

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: You are a cryptozoologist investigating remote regions in this Peggle-inspired puzzle game. Clear the foliage to find the creatures of your dreams!

Instructions: Mouse over the bottom right of the game to highlight an area where you can spawn a ball. Clear all pegs on the level to win.

Development and art by Krepta.

Music by Adrian von Ziegler.

https://github.com/kreptv/CryptidConjecture
